trans-unit.source: An abstract class that describes a gradient, composed of gradient stops.
trans-unit.target: En abstrakt klasse som beskriver en gradering består av gradering stopper.

trans-unit.source: Classes that inherit from GradientBrush describe different ways of interpreting gradient stops.
trans-unit.target: Klasser som arver fra GradientBrush beskriver forskjellige måter å tolke gradering stopper.

trans-unit.source: A GradientBrush is a type of <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object and therefore can be frozen to improve performance.
trans-unit.target: En GradientBrush er en type <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekt, og derfor kan være låst for å forbedre ytelsen.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For information about <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> features, such as freezing and cloning, see the [Freezable Objects Overview](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).
trans-unit.target: For informasjon om <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>Funksjoner, for eksempel fryse og kloning, kan du se den [oversikt over Freezable](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush"></xref> class.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush"> </xref> klasse.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush"></xref> class with the specified <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Initialiserer en ny forekomst av den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush"> </xref> klassen med den angitte <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: The <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection"></xref> used to specify the location and color of the transition points in a gradient.
trans-unit.target: Den <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection"> </xref> brukes til å angi plasseringen og fargen på overgang punktene i gradering.

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush"></xref>, making deep copies of this object's values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush"> </xref>, gjør dype kopier av verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: When copying dependency properties, this method copies resource references and data bindings (but they might no longer resolve) but not animations or their current values.
trans-unit.target: Når du kopierer avhengighetsegenskaper, denne metoden kopierer ressursen referanser og data bindinger (men de kan ikke løse) men ikke animasjoner eller gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.Clone%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen<xref uid="langword_csharp_true." name="true." href=""></xref>

trans-unit.source: Creates a modifiable clone of this <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush"></xref> object, making deep copies of this object's current values.
trans-unit.target: Oppretter en kan endres kopi av denne <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush"> </xref> objektet gjør dype kopier av gjeldende verdier for dette objektet.

trans-unit.source: This method is used to produce modifiable copies of frozen <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> objects (or any <xref:System.Windows.Freezable> object).
trans-unit.target: Denne metoden brukes til å kunne endres kopiere låste <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objekter (eller en <xref:System.Windows.Freezable>objektet).</xref:System.Windows.Freezable> </xref:System.Windows.Freezable>

trans-unit.source: For convenience, this method shadows the inherited version with a strongly typed implementation.
trans-unit.target: Når som helst skygger denne metoden arvede versjon med en forespørselsparameter av sterk type implementering.

trans-unit.source: For more information, see <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.
trans-unit.target: Hvis du vil ha mer informasjon, kan du se <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>.</xref:System.Windows.Freezable.CloneCurrentValue%2A?displayProperty=fullName>

trans-unit.source: Resource references, data bindings, and animations are not copied, but their current values are.
trans-unit.target: Refererer til ressursen, databindinger og animasjoner kopieres ikke, men er gjeldende verdier.

trans-unit.source: A modifiable clone of the current object.
trans-unit.target: En kan endres kopi av det gjeldende objektet.

trans-unit.source: The cloned object's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""></xref> even if the source's <xref:System.Windows.Freezable.IsFrozen*> property is <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Det klonede objektet <> </> *> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_false" name="false" href=""> </xref> selv om kildens <> </> *> egenskapen <xref uid="langword_csharp_true" name="true" href=""> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorInterpolationMode"></xref> enumeration that specifies how the gradient's colors are interpolated.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorInterpolationMode"> </xref> opplisting som angir hvordan det gradering farger interpolert.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: Specifies how the colors in a gradient are interpolated.
trans-unit.target: Angir hvordan fargene i gradering interpolert.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorInterpolationMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Media.ColorInterpolationMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.ColorInterpolationMode*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.ColorInterpolationMode*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.ColorInterpolationMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the brush's gradient stops.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir den velgeren gradering stopper.

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: A collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStop"></xref> objects associated with the brush, each of which specifies a color and an offset along the brush's gradient axis.
trans-unit.target: En samling av <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStop"> </xref> objekter som er knyttet til velgeren, som angir en farge og en forskyvning langs den velgeren gradering aksen.

trans-unit.source: The default is an empty <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standarden er en tom <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientStopCollection"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.GradientStops*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets a <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode"></xref> enumeration that specifies whether the gradient brush's positioning coordinates are absolute or relative to the output area.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir en <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode"> </xref> opplisting som angir om gradering velgeren for plassering koordinater er absolutt eller relativ til utskrift.

trans-unit.source: A value of <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode> indicates the gradient brush's coordinates are expressed using device independent pixels.
trans-unit.target: Verdien <xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>angir gradering velgeren koordinatene uttrykkes med enheten uavhengig piksler.</xref:System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode>

trans-unit.source: ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ## Egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: A <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode"></xref> value that specifies how the gradient brush's positioning coordinates are interpreted.
trans-unit.target: En <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode"> </xref> verdi som angir hvordan gradering velgeren for plassering koordinatene tolkes.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Media.BrushMappingMode"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.MappingMode*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.

trans-unit.source: Gets or sets the type of spread method that specifies how to draw a gradient that starts or ends inside the bounds of the object to be painted.
trans-unit.target: Henter eller angir typen oppslag metode som angir hvordan å tegne en gradering som starter eller slutter i grensene for objektet som males.

trans-unit.source: The following illustration shows the available spread methods and their effect on <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>.
trans-unit.target: Illustrasjonen nedenfor viser metodene tilgjengelig oppslag og hva som skjer på <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>.</xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>

trans-unit.source: The red line indicates the gradient space.
trans-unit.target: Den røde linjen angir gradering plass.

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush> defines its gradient space with its <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>definerer den gradering space med den <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A>og <xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.EndPoint%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush.StartPoint%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.LinearGradientBrush>

trans-unit.source: A <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush> defines its gradient space with its <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.Center%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusX%2A>, and <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusY%2A> properties.
trans-unit.target: En <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>definerer den gradering space med den <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.Center%2A>, <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusX%2A>, og <xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusY%2A>Egenskaper.</xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusY%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.RadiusX%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush.Center%2A> </xref:System.Windows.Media.RadialGradientBrush>

trans-unit.source: ![Different GradientSpread settings](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-gradientspread.png "Different GradientSpread settings") Gradient spread methods ## Dependency Property Information ||| |-|-| |Identifier field|| |Metadata properties set to `true`|None|
trans-unit.target: ![Ulike innstillinger for GradientSpread](~/add/media/img-mmgraphics-gradientspread.png "annen GradientSpread innstillinger") gradering spredt metoder ## egenskapen avhengighetsinformasjon ||| |-|-| | ID-feltet | | | Metadata egenskapene til `true`| Ingen |

trans-unit.source: The type of spread method used to paint the gradient.
trans-unit.target: Typen for oppslag metoden som brukes til fargemerknader graderingen.

trans-unit.source: The default is <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientSpreadMethod"></xref>.
trans-unit.target: Standard <xref href="System.Windows.Media.GradientSpreadMethod"> </xref>.

trans-unit.source: Identifies the <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.SpreadMethod*> dependency property.
trans-unit.target: Identifiserer den <xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.SpreadMethod*>avhengighetsegenskapen.</xref:System.Windows.Media.GradientBrush.SpreadMethod*>

trans-unit.source: To be added.
trans-unit.target: Som skal legges til.
